title: An expanded College Football Playoff could save college sports, but not in this greedy, imbalanced era
description: The revenue from a bigger college football playoff could compensate athletes throughout Division I and buoy other sports. That won't happen. Not with Greg Sanke...
snippet:
Open Extended Reactions

In 1960, Northwestern athletics director Stu Holcomb got a wild idea: A playoff in college football!
